GSD.description:
spi: fsi: Implement a timeout for polling status

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit dac1438f347d3b8cf892105c94e254f29c5764de. For more details please see the references link.
